snippet.title: Building The Belt — Behind the Scenes of The Expanse: A Telltale Series
snippet.description:
The second you start your first space walk in The Expanse: A Telltale Series, you see the scope of what’s all around you: The skeleton of a warship, blown apart and adrift in space. Navigating is more than simply walking from point A to point B. 

In the latest behind-the-scenes video, the Telltale and Deck Nine teams talk about how they created the environments you'll be exploring, and why they're so important to how you’ll explore the story and expand upon your choices.

The Expanse: A Telltale Series launches July 27th for Epic Game Store, PlayStation 4 / 5, and Xbox Series S / X and One.

EPIC GAME STORE
Standard Edition: https://store.epicgames.com/p/the-expanse-a-telltale-series?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=ZeroGVid&sub_id=telltale 
Deluxe Edition: https://store.epicgames.com/p/the-expanse-a-telltale-series--deluxe-edition?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=ZeroGVid&sub_id=telltale

XBOX
Deluxe Edition: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9mwg1nj92q94?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=ZeroGVid
Standard Edition: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9nfxwr3nbq9s?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=ZeroGVid

PLAYSTATION
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10004308/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=ZeroGVid
